Markdown Init File Example
==========================

```robotframework
=============  =============  ==============  =====
  Setting          Value           Value      Value
=============  =============  ==============  =====
Documentation  Testing suite  init file       \
Suite Setup    Suite Setup    \               \
=============  =============  ==============  =====

+----------+---------------------+
| Variable |        Value        |
+----------+---------------------+
| ${msg}   | Running suite setup |
+----------+---------------------+
```

* One more table

```robotframework
============ === ======
  Keywords   \   \
============ === ======
Suite Setup  Log ${msg}
============ === ======
```
